Arnold, Billy. "Billy the Kid" p. 25-28 in True Sport Picture Stories, v. 3, no. 2 (Aug. 1945).

Begins: "Brightest and newest star in the fistic sky is William Marshall Arnold, 18-year-old Philadelphia Negro high-school boy. Professional boxer after school hours, he has KO'd 28 out of 30 opponents and still has to lose his first bout."
